login

public java.lang.String login()
Action to login into GEPEQ.

Note that login can be succesful or not. Next view and/or messages displayed to user will depend on that result.

Returns:
Next view.

logout

public java.lang.String logout()
Action to logout from GEPEQ.

Note that next view will be the introduction page.

Returns:
Next view (introduction page)
